prompt: Subject: The Woman (late 20s, warm brown hair) and The Man (late 20s-30s, dark brown hair) in a brief, tender interaction. Context: Bustling cafe bathed in golden hour light, soft sun-drenched interiors. Action: The Man gently bumps The Woman's table, leans in to apologize softly; their eyes lock in a fleeting, introspective glance. Style: Soft, warm cinematic aesthetic with intimate character focus. Camera Motion & Angle: Slow push-in from medium close-up to tight close-up, eye-level. Composition: Intimate close-ups on their faces, emphasizing micro-expressions and the meeting of eyes. Ambiance: Golden hour light, warm earthy tones, intimate and introspective mood.
camera_movement: Slow push-in to tight close-up, maintaining eye-level framing
label: story
